product_name: Xiaomi Mi Smart Clock Alarm and Touch Screen with Google Assistant & Speaker
description:
🚚 LOCAL SELLER, READY STOCK // SHIPPING FROM SG 
🔥 FAST DELIVERY // WITHIN 1-3 WORKING DAYS 

🔰 FREE 1 YEAR LOCAL WARRANTY

 ● IT'S A CLOCK, AND MORE ●
➕ Built-in Speaker
➕ 4" Touch Screen Display
➕ Google Voice Assistant
➕ Time (both Digital & Analogue time display)
➕ Digital Photo Album
➕ YouTube / Spotify / Google Chromecast
➕ Alarm
➕ Weather
➕ Main Control Centre for your smart devices & appliances
➕ Link to CCTV to view recordings
➕ Calendar / Planners / News etc.

HIGHLIGHTS
⏰【Always a New Look】Customize your clock face & display with over 10 clock face designs available and different colors to suit your interior. 
⏰【Digital Photo Album】Want a photo as your clock face display? Choose and set your photos, selfies, family pictures, your pet pictures, or just anything you like really. 
⏰【Stay Informed】With help from Google, easily get the information you need at a glance - Track the weather, your calendar, commute info, news and more
⏰【Play your favorite tunes】Play your favorite music, podcast, or radio show from YouTube Music or Spotify directly. Supports Chromecast as well, so you can stream your favorite shows, movies, or music on your TV or speakers using only your voice.
⏰【Control smart home devices】Connect to your other IoT devices and use Mi Smart Clock as a control center. Tell Mi Smart Clock to off the lights or turn on your air purifier without having to lift a finger.
⏰【Keep watch, feel safe】Connect Mi Smart Clock to a smart camera to see what the camera is recording directly on the clock screen. 
⏰【Night mode clock setting】The display time on the screen dims so that doesn’t disturb the eye at night. 

SPECIFICATIONS
🔔Version: Global 
🔔Voice Assistant: Google 
🔔Dimensions: 113mm x 68mm x 81.5mm 
🔔Weight: 272g 
🔔Display: 4" 800x480 LCD 
🔔Resolution: 800x480 
🔔Microphone: 2-mic array 
🔔Speaker: 1.5-inch full range speaker 
🔔Wireless: WiFi 2.4GHz, Bluetooth 5.0 
🔔Supported Systems: Android 4.4, iOS 9.0 and above 
🔔Power Supply: 5V/2A 
🔔Port: Micro-USB 
🔔Color: White 

WHAT'S IN THE BOX
📦 1 x Mi Smart Clock
📦 1 x Power Adapter
📦 1 x User Manual

❤️🥰 Thank you for choosing DASHER 🥰❤️

For Return / Refund / Replacement item
We accept:
✅ Manufacturer Defect – For Item Itself 
✅ Wrong Item
✅ Missing Accessories/ Less Item Received
Kindly 📷 take photo of the item and provide order number to our customer service agent for further details.

product_name: Amazon Echo Dot 4 (4th Gen) | Smart speaker, with clock option
description:
*Meet the all-new Echo Dot - Our most popular smart speaker with Alexa. The sleek, compact design delivers crisp vocals and balanced bass for full sound.
*Voice control your entertainment - Stream songs from Apple Music, Spotify, and others. Play music, audiobooks, and podcasts throughout your home with multi-room music.
*Ready to help - Ask Alexa to tell a joke, play music, answer questions, play the news, check the weather, set alarms, and more.
*Control your smart home - Use your voice to turn on lights, adjust thermostats, and lock doors with compatible devices.
*US 2 pin Plug , Dual voltage 110v-240v
*Connect with others - Call almost anyone hands-free. Instantly drop in on other rooms or announce to the whole house that dinner's ready. Note that Freetime is not available in singapore
*Designed to protect your privacy - Built with multiple layers of privacy protections and controls, including a microphone off button that electronically disconnects the microphones.

*3 months local warranty

product_name: JBL Horizon Bluetooth® clock radio with USB charging and ambient light
description:
Stream, charge and wake up to a multi-sensory experience with
room-filling JBL stereo sound and ambient light.
The JBL Horizon clock radio offers room-filling JBL stereo sound with wireless Bluetooth® streaming, dual fast charge USB ports, crisp LCD display and ambient light. It features two alarms, with a choice of original digital alarm tones, up to five radio presets and a battery backup to make sure you always wake up on time. Its compact design is suitable for placement almost anywhere.

Multi-sensory alarm clock with LED ambient light
- Dual independent alarms for you and your partner
- Choice of FM radio, original digital alarm tones, music streamed from a Bluetooth® device
or traditional buzzer
- LED ambient light helps to wake you up gently
- LCD display automatically adjusts brightness to suit room lighting
Room-filling JBL stereo sound
- Rich, room-filling JBL stereo sound from a compact device
- Enjoy JBL sound whether using it as an alarm clock or as a Bluetooth® speaker
Bluetooth® streaming
- Stream your music wirelessly via Bluetooth®
- Compatible with all smart devices
USB charging
- Two USB ports provide fast charging for up to two devices
Compact, attractive design
- Rounded lines and compact form complements any décor
- Soft, rubberized finish is inviting to touch
- Available in black or white

product_name: Philips TAR3205 Digital FM Radio Alarm Clock
description:
Keep it simple with this FM digital clock radio. Plenty of presets make station navigation a breeze, and you can set the alarm to wake you to a gently rising radio volume. Want to sleep in? Just reach out and hit the snooze button.

- Power type: AC Input
- FM digital radio, Digital tuning up to 10 presets
- Dual alarm
- Alarm source (Buzzer, FM Radio)
- Sleep Timer (15/ 30/ 60/ 90/ 120 mins)
- LED Display
-  Snooze (repeat alarm) 9 mins
- 1 Year Warranty

description:

Setup: To set up the device, you have to use a mobile phone and an app. If you are not comfortable with setting up with an app, please avoid purchasing this item. Azan setup is not elderly friendly. Purchase the Al-Harameen azan clocks for easy setup.
